title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
OB: When a working set with one project is created and selected, the package view is filtered.
EB: Currently, when removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. In my opinion, the refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulation. I also believe that pressing cancel should revert all changes made to the working set, including canceling the removal.
SR:
1. Create a new working set with one project.
2. Select the created working set.
3. Observe that the package view is filtered.
4. Remove the working set.
5. Verify that the package view does not immediately refilter.
6. Verify that changes made to the working set are canceled when pressing cancel.
